alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 12:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Door County through 115 PM CDT... At 1224 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Sturgeon Bay, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonport and Egg Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
